snippet.title: Sega Dreamcast Longplay - Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike (Ibuki)
snippet.description:
I've been having trouble finding the proper program to record 1080p Dreamcast footage. Most of the stuff I had were either having frame skipping or audio syncing issues. Luckily, Streamlabs didn't have such problems and... well here we go. Either way, hope you enjoy my first recordings from the DCHDMI.

     I used 3rd Strike and found that the screen is not arcade perfect. There's a shimmering effect all over.I Checked with other fighters such as CVS2 and KOF and found them to be fine. Plus the dithering all over is a bit distracting. Still, looks pretty good for the most part.

    Please forgive my poor performance. I'm not the best that these games... but man they are still fun.
